name: Rhythm heart
description:
The game can be difficult if you haven't played the rhythm of the game before

Rhythm heart is a rhythm game inspired by games like Undertale and Rhythm Doctor. The essence of the game is to protect yourself from viruses, thereby saving the patient. The plot is told through dialogues. The team that developed the game consists of 3 people: PLAY, quipinny and Circledropper.
